name: PlatformEye
description:
A traditional 2D side-scrolling platformer game combined with different mechanics of your eyes, and it is up to you to figure out what your eyes can do. Eyes may help or deter your progress.

Shortcuts:

  • Q: Go back to the previous level
  • E: Skip to the next level
  • Z: Toggle circle display that shows the position of your eyes.

Gameplay Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5dP-BmG4jVo
